pages.text: A $(9)Mob Spawner$() is a magical block that can funnel in entities from the void.$(p)But you knew that already, so let's get on to the new stuff.$(p)In Apotheosis, spawners can be picked up with $(9)Silk Touch$().

Harvesting a spawner in that way will incur an additional durability cost.$(p)Mob spawners have a series of $(l:apotheosis:spawner/stats)Spawner Stats$() which control their functionality.$(p)These stats can be changed using $(l:apotheosis:spawner/modifiers)Spawner Modifiers$().
